document.full_text: world stocks ticked higher from this week's 4-week low on thursday, underpinned by strong appetite for commodity trader glencore's  initial public offering, while the euro fell on concerns over greek debt.
document.title: world stocks above 4-week low; euro falls
lines_and_colors: world stocks ticked higher from this week's 4-week low on thursday, underpinned by strong appetite for commodity trader glencore's  initial public offering, while the euro fell on concerns over greek debt.
